text: Swiss Super League is a football league which is top division in Switzerland. ==2022-23 season== ===Participating clubs=== The teams competing in the 2022-23 season are Team Manager Venue Capacity BSC Young Boys Raphael Wicky Stade de Suisse 32,000 F.C. St. Gallen Peter Zeidler Kybunpark 18'861 Grasshopper Club Zürich Giorgio Contini Letzigrund 26,104 F.C. Sion Paolo Tramezzani Stade de Tourbillon 14,283 F.C. Basel Alexander Frei St. Jakob-Park 38,512 Servette F.C. Alain Geiger Stade de Genève 30,084 F.C. Lugano Mattia Croci-Torti Stadio di Cornaredo 6,630 FC Luzern Mario Frick Swissporarena 16,490 FC Winterthur Bruno Berner Stadion Schützenwiese 8,400 F.C.
